      public LineNodeTest()

  • Method Details

    • testInsert

      @Test public void testInsert()
      Test the insert() method of LineNode by verifying the correct insertion of characters at specified positions within the line.

      This test creates a LineNode, inserts characters at different positions, and asserts that the resulting string representation is as expected.

    • testModify

      @Test public void testModify()
      Test the modify() method of LineNode by verifying the correct modification of characters at specified positions within the line.

      This test creates a LineNode, inserts a character, modifies it, and asserts that the resulting string representation is as expected.

    • testDelete

      @Test public void testDelete()
      Test the delete() method of LineNode by verifying the correct deletion of characters at specified positions within the line.

      This test creates a LineNode, inserts a character, deletes it, and asserts that the resulting string representation is as expected.

    • testDeleteLineBreak

      @Test public void testDeleteLineBreak()
      Test the deleteLineBreak() method of LineNode by verifying the correct deletion of the line break between two LineNode instances.

      This test creates two LineNode instances, inserts characters, sets one as the next node of the other, deletes the line break, and asserts the result.

    • testInsertLineBreak

      @Test public void testInsertLineBreak()
      Test the insertLineBreak() method of LineNode by verifying the correct insertion of a line break at a specified position within the line.

      This test creates a LineNode, inserts a character, inserts a line break, and asserts that the resulting string representation is as expected.
